org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.serialization

Interface RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpanningRecordSerializer

    public interface RecordSerializer<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    Interface for turning records into sequences of memory segments.
